Html: I am new to this project.  I cannot open project in the visual studio 2008 with MVP 2.0 but I can't download the MVP 1.0.  Does anyone have the project to work with new VS 2008 version?

The solution is download the MVC 1 from http://www.microsoft.com/downloads/details.aspx?displaylang=en&FamilyID=53289097-73ce-43bf-b6a6-35e00103cb4b.  I do not know there is another tool that could convert project from version 1 to version 2.
